item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a medical IT specialist working as a technical Coordinator for a federal funded project to further medical IT in Germany. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan.
